output.sentences: My military unit had a fourth of July picnic.
We scoped out a campground for a good picnic spot.
A male soldier unfolded a blanket to lay out the picnic food on.
This organization deserved a picnic but it got too hot so we set down a flag and left.
We stared at the flag and remembered how this location will know represent independence by the flag sitting there.
